MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Spring Gardens and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a underground cable fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:20PM on 2ND January 2021.
